app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps RecorderHQ Pro
app_description: RecorderHQ make your iPhone or iPad an voice recorder. We support record mp3 m4a and wav format directly. Sharing audio files to iCloud Drvie Dropbox Google Drive and OneDrive. Speech to text Real time monitor while recording. support transfer large file via USB in iTunes just connect your iPhone to PC. Transferring audio file via WIFI is easy. support sending file via whatsapp try open in other application feature support trim audio file merge multiple audio files. support save audio file into camera roll. transfer files from iphone to pc via wifi and browser Multiple sample rate from 8000hz to 44100hz Support aif wav m4a and caf and mp3 file format. Support pause forward rewind. support bluetooth USB microphone usb adapter needed . export file via iTunes email. Organize you audio files in folder. support background recording and playback. support sending voice to Dropbox and Google Drive and SoundCloud. support sending voice to other device via bluetooth or wifi. iCloud Drive Airplay support. Convert files into Mp3 format CBR VBR format support audio file upload or download from SoundCloud Magic tap disabled two fingers double tap is disabled prevent recording interruption Support lock screen while recording. iPhone only Support Today Widget
